task_list.task: Determine ways to strengthen or combine materials or develop new materials with new or specific properties for use in a variety of products and applications.
task_list.IWA_Title: Develop operational or technical procedures or standards.

task_list.task: Prepare reports, manuscripts, proposals, and technical manuals for use by other scientists and requestors, such as sponsors and customers.
Recommend materials for reliable performance in various environments.
task_list.IWA_Title: Advise others on the design or use of technologies.

task_list.task: Confer with customers to determine how to tailor materials to their needs.
task_list.IWA_Title: Confer with clients to determine needs or order specifications.

task_list.task: Test metals to determine conformance to specifications of mechanical strength, strength-weight ratio, ductility, magnetic and electrical properties, and resistance to abrasion, corrosion, heat, and cold.
task_list.IWA_Title: Test characteristics of materials or products.

task_list.task: Test material samples for tolerance under tension, compression, and shear to determine the cause of metal failures.
task_list.IWA_Title: Test characteristics of materials or products.

task_list.task: Visit suppliers of materials or users of products to gather specific information.
task_list.IWA_Title: Collect information about patients or clients.

task_list.task: Announce musical selections, station breaks, commercials, or public service information, and accept requests from listening audience.
task_list.IWA_Title: Provide information or assistance to the public.

task_list.task: Accept payments, and make change or write charge slips as necessary.
Perform experiments and computer modeling to study the nature, structure, and physical and chemical properties of metals and their alloys, and their responses to applied forces.
task_list.IWA_Title: Develop scientific or mathematical theories or models.

task_list.task: Test individual parts and products to ensure that manufacturer and governmental quality and safety standards are met.
task_list.IWA_Title: Test characteristics of materials or products.

task_list.task: Supervise and monitor production processes to ensure efficient use of equipment, timely changes to specifications, and project completion within time frame and budget.
task_list.IWA_Title: Monitor operations to ensure adequate performance.
